content.question: If <math alttext="f of x equals, the natural log of x, times cosine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>, then <math alttext="f prime of x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="negative, the fraction sine x, over x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>
<math alttext="the fraction sine x, over x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction cosine x, over x, end fraction, minus the natural log of x, times sine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction cosine x, over x, end fraction, plus the natural log of x, times sine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction cosine x, over x, end fraction, minus the natural log of x, times sine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
